name: Universelle Genesis Collection
description: The Genesis collection will be a privileged pass to all our events, software developments and collaborations. - Lifetime access to all our events (with associated prizes). - Access to betas and developed software at no cost. - Whitelist and Airdrops of projects developed in collaboration with other brands and creators.After the launch of the Genesis and the first event the following events will be purchased separately as a ticket that will give access to that event exclusively with the airdrop or prizes associated with it.
